jd: From: abhisek, source infotech abhisek.k@sourceinfotech.com Reply to: abhisek.k@sourceinfotech.com Job Title: Oracle PL/SQL DBA Architect Duration: 2- 3 years Contract Position Location: Albany, NY (local or within a 30-mile radius/mandatory) Visa: No OPT/CPT/H1B Total Experience Required: 7 years "Need Linkedin" Documentation: qualified candidates will need to provide copy of their Visa (H1B allowed) or Green Card and a copy of their non-US passport. Citizens will need to provide a copy of their driver’s license. Requirements: • 84 Months Experience developing Oracle PL/SQL using advanced PL/SQL programming techniques. • 84 Months Experience using Oracle development tools such as SQL Plus, SQL Developer, and SQL Loader for programming and maintaining applications. • 84 Months Experience designing and implementing logical and physical database models, including indexes, primary keys, foreign keys, and constraints. • 48 months Experience performing Extract, Transform, and Load (ETL) techniques. • 24 months Experience optimizing, performance tuning, and debugging PL/SQL Responsibilities: The Database Architect will be responsible for, but not limited to, the analysis and design of database objects and data collection systems, including the transformation of legislative requirements into system functionality; data modelling; responsible for software development tasks including coding, testing, and implementation; prepares technical and user documentation.
